sourcesContent:
import Chart from "../Chart/Chart"


const ExpensesChart = props => {
    const chartDataPoints = [
        { label: 'Jan', value: 0},
        { label: 'Feb', value: 0},
        { label: 'Mar', value: 0},
        { label: 'Apr', value: 0},
        { label: 'May', value: 0},
        { label: 'Jun', value: 0},
        { label: 'Jul', value: 0},
        { label: 'Aug', value: 0},
        { label: 'Sep', value: 0},
        { label: 'Oct', value: 0},
        { label: 'Mov', value: 0},
        { label: 'Dec', value: 0},
    ]

    for (const expense of props.expense) {
        const expenseMonth = expense.date.getMonth()
        chartDataPoints[expenseMonth].value += expense.amount
    }

    return <Chart dataPoint={chartDataPoints} />
}

export default ExpensesChart
